name: Base ModSpec
desc: A collection of notes, guidelines, and practical examples that enable one to adapt and apply this modification to various hulls.

name: Apocrita Association Ship Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls produced by the Apocrita Association.

name: Apocrita Association Weapon Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common weapons produced by the Apocrita Association.
